There was an error resolving the shortened URL. You might want to open it in your browser.
Linkbasher saves you time by resolving shortened links without opening your browser.
bit.ly, dnlchw.net, fb.me, goo.gl, ift.tt, is.gd, ow.ly, t.co, tinyurl.com, tmblr.co, wp.me

The next time you tap on a shortened link and are prompted with a list of apps, choose \"Linkbasher\" then hit \"Always\". Linkbasher will do the rest! (Linkbasher will prompt you to choose a different app if for any reason it can\'t resolve the given link.)
Linkbasher was written by David Johnston. The source code can be found on GitHub: http://github.com/johnsto/linkbasher
